content.raw:
When resizing the scene 3D plugin, I can see using `top` that the memory almost doubles each time the window is resized.

I traced it down to [these](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/753140dee4eac1f8e3beb99c86d1c7475c359298/src/plugins/Scene3D.cc?at=gz11&fileviewer=file-view-default#Scene3D.cc-461) lines on `Scene3D`. If I comment out `SetImageWidth`, `SetImageHeight` and `SetAspectRatio`, the issue doesn't happen.

The comment on the code, `setting the size should cause the render texture to be rebuilt` led me to [OgreRenderTarget::RebuildImpl](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/a346e7d9dbdfa29872e1edbbe32c21000b28686f/ogre/src/OgreRenderTarget.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#OgreRenderTarget.cc-136). There are some "destroy" functions which are not implemented there.

I started trying to implement them [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/2ddaf44076439445cda7c565a564a26cd6bacb07), but the memory leak is still happening.

@iche033 , any tips?
